Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is visible from Route 101/Nashua Road and is located just minutes from municipal offices, retail, restaurant, daycare and fitness, with convenient access to Exit 4 off Interstate 93.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Londonderry Medical Park II is located at 41 Buttrick Road, Londonderry, New Hampshire. This two-story building is situated directly across the street from the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, making it ideal for medical or outpatient use.
Suite 4 is located on the first floor suite and is comprised of a total of 3,019 SF. The suite is configured with a waiting/reception area, exam rooms, clinical area, private offices, kitchenette, restrooms and ample storage (shell condition). The building is handicap accessible with ample onsite parking.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Medical Office Space - 3,019 SF Available Immediately

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
143-157 Main Street in Nashua, New Hampshire is located in downtown Nashua with its trendy shops, restaurants and bustling business activity. This office space is an ideal location for any company that is looking for outstanding downtown presence.
Situated on the corner of Main and Factory Streets, the building offers Â±1,000-9,000 SF of office space for lease. The space is comprised of  8,000 SF on the second floor with a mix of hard wall offices and open area. Additionally, there is 1,000 SF on the first floor. The first and second floors have direct access to Main Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1,726-3,775 SF of office space for lease in the historic Telegraph Building located at 60 Main Street in downtown Nashua, New Hampshire. The building offers excellent views of the Nashua River along with outstanding downtown street presence and an upscale professional image with exposed brick throughout. The property has its own on-site parking as well as quick access to the F.E. Everett Turnpike.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Office suites range from Â±1,000-6,000 SF. Flexible configurations make this an excellent location for a wide variety of professional office uses.
